author: olegk
msg: * Another attempt at fixing NTLM proxy + basic host authentication (R: #24352)
* AuthModule interface implementing authentication modules can now be
* Authentication modules can now retain limited state information (the state is
retained within the lifetime of the method director)
* Authentication scheme selection routine can be easily parameterized
* Yet another massive refactoring of HttpMethodDirector

author: olegk
msg: PR: #24352 (NTLM Proxy and basic host authorization)
The bug turned out to be nastier than I initially thought. Another (and hopefully the final) take at fixing it

author: olegk
msg: Fixes mixed up authentication host & realm parameters in the basic authentication example

author: oglueck
msg: Infrastructure for small local servers for testing.

author: oglueck
msg: Added basic proxy tests. Feel free to add more sophisticated stuff.
